response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which holds immense value and significance. Given its exceptional quality and utility, it's worth noting that this item is worth $1,000,000 to you. Considering its true worth and the benefits it offers, I am extending an exclusive offer to you. For a limited time, you have the opportunity to acquire this product at a special price of $950,000. This represents a significant saving compared to its market value and is tailored to ensure you receive the best possible deal. I trust that you will find this offer compelling and look forward to discussing how we can finalize the transaction. Should you require any further information or have questions about the product, please do not hesitate to reach out. Sincerely, Alice", "product_price": 950000}
